question: What are the names of disaster projects advertised before 2023
raw_answer: Guardrail Replacement Citywide, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Clover Heights Storm Drain
evidence_answer: Clover Heights Storm Drain, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Guardrail Replacement Citywide

Vehicle Protection Devices

(cid:190) Project Description: Per Malibu Municipal Code Section 17.48.070 requires
vehicle impact protection devices to be installed for all parking spaces
located adjacent to any outdoor pedestrian seating area.

This project is scheduled to be accepted by the Council
at the January 24, 2022 meeting. Disaster Projects (Design)

There are two
locations within the City’s right-of-way and City-owned property that would
require a vehicle impact protection device.

The existing storm drain facility ends at
the intersection of Clover Heights and Harvester Road.

An extended storm
drain towards the end of Clover Heights will help eliminate this issue.
